patterns: I feel increase in my body temperature
responses: No worries, Here are few home remedies you can follow: 1. Stay hydrated, rest and dress lightly, 2:Use fever reducers like acetaminophen or ibuprofen. 3: If necessary, seek medical attention if fever persist or worsens.
Home remedies for cough include honey or ginger tea for soothing relief, alongside steam inhalation and staying hydrated to ease discomfort. If symptoms persist, consult a healthcare professional.
Lets fight fatigue: Stay hydrated, eat well, exercise regularly, ensure quality sleep, manage stress, and limit caffeine/alcohol intake. Take short breaks for rejuvenation.
